query_1.text: Who was George Washington and what role did he play in the founding of the United States?

query_2.text: What were some of the significant achievements of George Washington during his presidency?

query_3.text: When did George Washington assume the presidency, and how long did he serve in that role?

query_4.text: Where was George Washington born, and how did his upbringing influence his leadership style?

query_5.text: Why is George Washington often referred to as the "Father of His Country"?

query_6.text: How did George Washington's military experience shape his approach to governance and leadership?
